text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/CodeSystem/C4BBPayeeType
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    beneficiaryBeneficiaryThe beneficiary (patient) will be reimbursed.
  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/payeetype
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    subscriberSubscriberThe subscriber (policy holder) will be reimbursed.
    providerProviderAny benefit payable will be paid to the provider (Assignment of Benefit).
    otherProviderAny benefit payable will be paid to a third party such as a guarrantor.

name: C4BBPayeeType
title: C4BB Payee Type
description: Identifies the type of recipient of the adjudication amount; i.e., provider, subscriber, beneficiary or another recipient.
